config.apex_mc.pingNumEach.description: The num of pings save for each player (work only in client side)
config.apex_mc.includeFluids.description: Whether you can ping on the fluid
config.apex_mc.infoColor.description: Info shown when looking at the ping point, format: 0xAARRGGBB
config.apex_mc.secondsToVanish.descripti:
How long does it take for the ping point to disappear.
0 means never, only work at your client side
config.apex_mc.highlightColor.descriptio: Color of the highlight block, format: 0xAARRGGBB
config.apex_mc.soundIndex.description:
The index of the ping sound:
0: ping location
1: ping enemy
2: ping item
3: mozambique lifeline
4: block anvil break
